talents.option1: Focus Fire Kills Advance Cooldown by 20s.

abilities.desc: Shackles the target to an enemy unit or tree in a line directly behind it.  If no unit or tree is present, the stun duration is reduced to [0.75, 0.75, 0.75, 0.75].
abilities.name: Shackleshot

abilities.desc: CHANNELED - Windranger charges her bow for up to [1] second for a single powerful shot, which deals more damage the longer it is charged. The arrow damages enemies along its path. For each enemy that Powershot hits, its damage is reduced.
abilities.name: Powershot
abilities.notes: Powershot will destroy trees in its area of effect.

abilities.desc: Increases movement speed and adds evasion from all physical attacks, while slowing movement of nearby enemies.
abilities.name: Windrun
abilities.notes: Activating Windrun will evade incoming projectiles.

abilities.desc: Vector Targeted. Summons a strong wind that pushes all enemies in the target area towards the target direction.
abilities.name: Gale Force

abilities.desc: Windranger channels the wind to gain [350, 425, 500] additional attack speed against a single enemy unit or structure, though with a reduction to her attack damage.  Extra damage from secondary item effects is not reduced.
abilities.name: Focus Fire
